title: Strawberry avocado salad
ingredients: ['Dressing', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 dessertspoons honey', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'Salad', '1 (150g) bag salad greens', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and sliced', '10 strawberries, sliced', '50g (2 oz) chopped pecans']
